mapper.select:
SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , A.INF_ID , A.INF_NO , A.INF_NAME , A.INF_TYPE_CD , A.PJT_ID , A.BIZ_ID , D.BIZ_NAME , A.REQ_ORG , A.REQ_BIZ , A.RSP_ORG , A.RSP_BIZ , A.INF_CLASS_CD , A.INF_PERIOD_CD , A.INF_METHOD_CD , A.INF_COM_TYPE , A.INF_TR_NO , A.INF_DESC , A.REMARK , A.PLAN_SDATE , A.PLAN_EDATE , A.ACTL_SDATE , A.ACTL_EDATE , A.CHG_USER_NM , A.DEV_USER_ID , A.DEV_USER_NM , A.DEV_USER_DEPT , A.PL_USER_ID , A.PL_USER_NM , A.PL_USER_DEPT , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT , B.PJT_NAME AS PJT_NAME , C.PJT_ID AS P_PJT_ID , C.PJT_NAME AS P_PJT_NAME , E.REQ_NO_INFO , E.REQ_NAME_INFO
FROM PJ_INTERFACE A , PJ_PROJECT B , PJ_PROJECT C , PJ_BIZ D , ( SELECT EE.PJT_ID , EE.INF_ID , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X, '¶', FF.REQ_NO) ORDER BY FF.REQ_NO, FF.REQ_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETCLOBVAL(),2) AS REQ_NO_INFO , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X, '¶', FF.REQ_NAME) ORDER BY FF.REQ_NO, FF.REQ_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETCLOBVAL(),2) AS REQ_NAME_INFO FROM PJ_INF_REQ_MAP EE , PJ_REQMENT FF WHERE 1 = 1 AND EE.REQ_ID = FF.REQ_ID AND EE.PJT_ID = FF.PJT_ID AND EE.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID}
GROUP BY EE.PJT_ID , EE.INF_ID ) E
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PJT_ID = B.PJT_ID AND B.PARENT_ID = C.PJT_ID AND A.PJT_ID = D.PJT_ID AND A.BIZ_ID = D.BIZ_ID AND A.PJT_ID = E.PJT_ID(+) AND A.INF_ID = E.INF_ID(+) AND A.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID}
AND A.BIZ_ID = #{BIZ_ID}
AND UPPER(A.INF_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{INF_NO}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.INF_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{INF_NM}) || '%'
AND A.INF_TYPE_CD = #{INF_TYPE_CD}
AND UPPER(A.CHG_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{CHG_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.DEV_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{DEV_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.PL_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{PL_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND A.INF_CLASS_CD = #{INF_CLASS_CD}
AND UPPER(A.REQ_ORG) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{REQ_ORG}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.REQ_BIZ) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{REQ_BIZ}) || '%'
AND A.INF_METHOD_CD = #{INF_METHOD_CD}
AND UPPER(A.RSP_ORG) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{RSP_ORG}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.RSP_BIZ) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{RSP_BIZ}) || '%'
AND A.INF_ID IN ( SELECT AA.INF_ID FROM PJ_INF_REQ_MAP AA , PJ_REQMENT BB
WHERE 1 = 1 AND AA.PJT_ID = BB.PJT_ID AND AA.REQ_ID = BB.REQ_ID AND AA.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID} AND UPPER(BB.REQ_NO) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{REQ_NO} || '%') )
AND ( A.PLAN_SDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} OR A.PLAN_EDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} )
AND ( A.ACTL_SDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} OR A.ACTL_EDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} )
ORDER BY A.INF_ID, A.INF_NO

DELETE FROM PJ_INF_REQ_MAP WHERE 1 = 1 AND INF_ID = #{INF_ID}
DELETE FROM PJ_INTERFACE WHERE 1 = 1 AND INF_ID = #{INF_ID}
